abstract: Charlotte, NC, City Council legalizes use of public restrooms by transgender people based on their choice of gender identity; adds measure that deems sexual orientation, gender identity and marital status as attributes protected from discrimination when using public accommodations.
lead_paragraph: Charlotte has legalized the ability of transgender people to choose public restrooms corresponding to their gender identity.

headline.main: North Carolina: State Lawmakers Target Restroom Anti-Bias Law in Charlotte
headline.print_headline: North Carolina: State Lawmakers Target Restroom Anti-Bias Law in Charlotte
